Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

TrustedAuthenticator

public TrustedAuthenticator(java.util.Map config)
                     throws java.io.IOException,
                            OAuthException,
                            OAuthCommunicationException
Takes a Map of configuration values (similar to what's loaded by loadConfig) and configures a for accessing the Dropbox service. You can preconfigure an access token by setting access_token_key and access_token_secret in the config map.

Throws:
java.io.IOException
OAuthException
OAuthCommunicationException
